text: Suit up. Winners don't greet the day in
sweatpants. You have too many saints.
Fun time is over. I want to remember why
we are here. It involves doing some bad
things. What kind of bad things?
Crossing lines. Get in. Taking risks.
Maybe even breaking a few laws. So, tell
me about your time in New York.
We make a good team. Wish I could say
the same. I didn't mean it. Yes, you
did. The Suits LA event starts Sunday on
